params.welcome_message:
Welcome to my corner of the internet.

Whether you're here for the latest posts, looking for something specific, or just browsing around, I'm glad you stopped by.

The function of this site has changed, but you can still access all of my [old posts](https://mattlangford.com/posts/). I am also currently writing a [blog for church leaders](https://deskofmatt.com). I have other projects that will be listed here by 14 August 2025, so check back then!  

Thanks for visiting.
